answers.answer: Actually, type I diabetes often results in weight loss, as well.  Both my son and grandson have it.  Is your diabetes under good control?Weight loss is always best achieved by implementing a program consisting of healthy diet and moderate exercise; this is especially important for anyone with underlying medical issues, such as diabetes, since diet is very important with diabetes.

question: How can i lose 15-20 pounds? I have type 1 diabetes... which can make weight loss hard.
title: Goodbye 15-20 lbs
